name: Everything has a cost
description:
This game is NOT FINISHED... THERE IS NO ENDING (I am just showing off the idea behind it)

you have to plan ahead every move to make sure you finish every level with as much money as possible (I believe the most possible is 88 or 93 depending on if you attempt to enter the door or not)

There is no sound and this is a very small project

tell me what you like and what you don't in the comments
